description: The man is charged with driving a motor vehicle with an alcohol level above the legal limit.
title: Drink-driving charge after tractor is stopped
title_page: Drink-driving charge after tractor is stopped in Somerset - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged with drink-driving after a tractor was stopped by officers.
The 34 year old was arrested on Stonehill in Street, Somerset, at around 19:45 GMT on 22 February.
The man was charged with driving a motor vehicle with an alcohol level above the legal limit.
He has been released on bail and is due to appear at Yeovil Magistrates' Court on Tuesday, 11 March.
